title: Silver Bells
description: Christmas ...with the wrong man!Jillian Kemp had planned the holiday carefully - a secluded cabin, a beautifully decorated tree, even stockings hanging by the fireplace. The first Christmas shared with her soon-to-be fiance, Harrison, would be perfect.But even the best of plans can fall apart. The electricity failed, the phone went dead and Harrison didn't show up. Then, just when it seemed things couldn't get any worse, a complete stranger arrived at the door.No amount of cautious planning could have prepared Jillian for Matt Carson. Handsome and virile, he stormed into the cabin - and her heart - as if he belonged there.
author: Val Daniels
